author: jaa
msg: Fixed a bug when svntest framework used an old, spurious log file from
previous test run for the current bindings test results.
"${MY_LOG_FILE_PREF}_check): Always remove these files before new

author: kou
msg: Add '--with-ruby-test-verbose' option to configure script for changing
output level of Ruby bindings tests.

author: kou
msg: Fix link command configuration for Ruby bindings.
instead of '\w+' for detecting compiler name.

author: lundblad
msg: Avoid lots of apr_stat calls in svn status and when checking if file contents
(svn_io_get_dirents2): Revised version of the above, returning both node kind
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_ops.c (erase_from_wc): Update comment to refer to
argument.  Only check the path kind/special status if it wasn't provided by
argument, passing them down to assemble_status().
(handle_dir_entry): Take kind and special arguments, using that information
instead of determining the path kind in this function.
(get_dir_status): Use svn_io_get_dirents2() instead of deprecated function.
Use information provided by that function instead of checking the path kind
again.  Pass path kind and special status to various functions.
(svn_wc_status2): Pass FALSE for special status parameter to
if the file exists before comparing timestamps, but instead handle the
error condition afterwards.  Still check for existence in the slow case, i.e.
svn_io_get_dirents(), but add svn_io_dirent_t structs to the hash instead

author: lundblad
msg: * subversion/libsvn_wc/README: Fix typos noticed by dlr and
